message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness.

Thanks for the offer, Alice! While I appreciate the product, $9,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $7,500. This would be a fair price for both of us and allow me to purchase the product without going over my budget.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still looking to get a good value for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8,200. I think this is a fair compromise that takes into account your budget and the product's worth.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $8,200 is still a little more than I'm comfortable spending. I'm willing to go up to $8,000.  This price aligns with my budget and would allow us to finalize this deal.
